title: House of Sand and Fog James Horner Varese Sarabande(Flac)
description:
Varese Sarabande Soundtrack House of Sand and Fog

2003 Academy Award nominee for Best Original Score

[CD INFO]
1. An Older Life
2. The Waves of the Caspian Sea
3. Old Photos, New Memories
4. This Is No Longer Your House
5. Two People
6. Kathy's Night
7. Parallel Lives, Parallel Loves
8. Behrani's Thoughts - Long Ago
9. Break-In
10. The Dreams of Kings
11. The Shooting, A Payment for Our Sins
12. "We Have Travelled So Far, It Is Time to Return to Our Path"
13. A Return to the Caspian, And to the Iran of Old

Music composed and conducted by James Horner
Soundtrack Produced by Simon Rhodes and James Horner
Music Recorded and Mixed by Simon Rhodes
Orchestrations by James Horner
Supervising Music Editor Jim Henrikson
Music Editor Ramiro Belgardt
Synthesizer Programming Ian Underwood, Randy Kerber
Assistant Engineer David Marquette
Performed by The Hollywood Studio Symphony
Music Contractor Sandy De Crescent
Music Preperation Bob Bornstein
Music Recorded at Todd-AO Scoring Stage, Studio City CA
Todd-AO Scoring Stage Crew:
Marc Gebauer, Jay Selvester, Kirsten Smith
Soundtrack Edited by Simon Rhodes
Soundtrack Mastered at Abbey Road Studios, London
Artwork by Adrienne Burk, The Cimarron Group/
David Sameth for DreamWorks

Executive for Varese Sarabande Records Robert Townson
Executive in Charge of Music for DreamWorks Pictures
Todd Homme

Copyright 2003 DreamWorks L.L.C

[FLAC COMPRESSION SETTINGS]
Compression level 8
